Australian holiday nightmare: Grandmother incapacitated after health crisis, family faces $100,000 bill to return her home https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/australian-holiday-nightmare-grandmother-incapacitated-after-health-crisis-family-faces-100000-bill-to-return-her-home/PYKE4YTZI5BNHGJEWHARP64BQE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/australian-holiday-nightmare-grandmother-incapacitated-after-health-crisis-family-faces-100000-bill-to-return-her-home/PYKE4YTZI5BNHGJEWHARP64BQE/ Isaac DavisonSui Manase's family faces a $100,000 bill for a Medivac flight back to Auckland. Her family is now raising money for a repatriation flight to Auckland.
